name: Global Domination — Boot to the Throat™
description:
Global Domination — Boot to the Throat™ is the companion style to Global Domination — Wipe Out! Boot to the Throat needs Wipe Out! to work. Get Wipe Out! right here on userstyles.org.
Almost every web site surrenders before the mightiness of Global Domination — Wipe Out!™ Yet, a few deluded pricks hide in the resistance. Global Domination — Boot to the Throat™ stomps out remaining nuisances on the most popular sites. Lace 'em up and get stomping!
additional_info:
Darkens Tumblr  and ESPN. Enhances IMDB • Bing • Yahoo! • LinkedIn and more!

I am quite active working on this style. If you have a specific site you want tweaked, ask for it.
